title.narrative: Rural Development: Transitional Programme of Post Conflict Reconstruction

description.narrative: The components of the proposed programme are entirely arranged around the goal of regenerating rural livelihoods reconstructing social capital, inclusive of rehabilitation of rural dignity and restoration of food security among poor and vulnerable people. The programme objectives by component are:(a)Local Governance (b)Rehabilitation and Development of Agriculture(c)Rehabilitation and Development of Rural Infrastructure.

name.narrative: Rural Development: Transitional Programme of Post Conflict Reconstruction

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
